column5: Great video Matt. Something has got to be off with the measurement/weight of that last pike you got. A 46-1/2" pike that only weighs 19 lbs.? Seems like it should have weighed more. Keep up the great work and good luck on your new venture.
Another 9 year old post revived. The website in the original link is for sale so I suspect the fishing show idea might not have panned out too well.
Ha. You mean I finally get off my butt and respond to a post and it's 9 years old? Figures.

The recent post that brought this thread up contains spam. First time I have seen spam of this sort where they appended a small section and a link into the quoted post. So, you may see more of this. Mods should probably delete it.
Those spammers are sneaky sob's...maybe it was the car warranty thread that got them stirred up on the site! Ha!

Hi Everyone, Just joined and thought I'd post a report of my week long fly in to Eddie North's Attawapiskat river camp. We went up June 1st and got into some sweet walleye and pike fishing. I made a pdf photo essay of the trip http://fishinginthewild.com/pdf/Fish...enture2013.pdf Hope you enjoy, Cheers, Jonesy P.S. Me and my buddy also made a video of our trip there. Can't wait till next year.http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TaOcSwPxX74
sorry guys, website is still being built. There should have been a photo essay pdf... Stay tuned, it will be up shortly Matt
Great video- I look forward to more from you!
Welcome to ther board and thanks for the report!!!!

Man, I totally envy your pursuit of your dreams. I hope you get lots of sponsors and your show becomes a great success. If you need someone to come along and clean your fish or tell you stories, I am probably available. Fish On!
Great video. Glad that you have found a piece of fishing heaven and hope that your adventure continues to grow every year. Mike Kansas
I agree great video...and congrats on the pike!

Welcome to the board. Great video and a great trip. I guess that my age is showing because I could live without the speaker breaking music and the Mike Iaconelli antics. Good video if you shut off the sound.
Nice video and agree on the music. Not sure if you have a longer one but 2 items I always like on videos are a camp tour and key tackle used.
